CheckTitle: Challenge Passage is configured with an appropriate security window
Description: Verifies that Challenge Passage (challenge TTL) is configured to an appropriate value (recommended: 1 hour) to balance security with user experience for verified visitors.
Risk: Challenge Passage set too short causes excessive challenges degrading user experience. Set too long, it may allow attackers extended access after passing initial challenge, reducing security effectiveness.

Recommendation.Text: Configure Challenge Passage to balance security and usability. A 1-hour window is generally recommended, but adjust based on your threat model and user experience requirements.

Notes: Challenge Passage determines how long a visitor who passes a challenge can access the site without being challenged again.
